block.l: var myself = this; this.arduino.ultrasoundValue = null; this.arduino.board.once('string', function(data){ myself.arduino.ultrasoundValue = parseFloat(data) }); this.arduino.board.sp.write(new Buffer([0xF0, 0x08, pinNumber, 0xF7]));
